Vehicle.Name: Ascendant Personal Stealth Flyer
Vehicle.Description: [H3]Ascendant Personal Stealth Flyer[h3] Please see page 57 of the Disciples of Harmony Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: [B]Stealth Systems[b]: Vessel will not register on passive scanners at short range or farther. Increase difficulty of any checks made to detect vessel by two.
